description: This schema represents the output of a model developed by Kumar et. al. that uses inputs denoting physiological arousal and a threshold to determine whether a person is stressed or not.

references.description: The Psychology Ontology code represents Physiological arousal, defined as Condition of alertness and readiness to respond as evidenced by physiological signs such as heart rate or blood pressure.

stress-categorical.description: If probability of stress above a predetermined threshold then 1, otherwise 0.
